title: WebDesigner / SEO Experte (m/f) gefunden bei Informance GmbH
subtitle: Wien, W 1100
body:
Über diese Stellenanzeige

Contact Your contact to Informance Contact Search Search Search About us Informance GmbH About us Full time or part time possible WebDesigner / SEO Experte (m/f) Your area of responsibility with us Embedded in a well-functioning creative team, you will advance the core area of graphic, screen and print design with new ideas and creative implementation. Our requirements As a designer, you are responsible for the graphical development of our projects both in the Web and occasionally in the print area, as well as for the related support of our existing customers. Her primary responsibilities include the design of web portals, customer support, search engine optimization, mailings and other graphic advertising. You implement visual information and navigation concepts with modern tools. You quickly capture the needs of our customers and turn your creative ideas into attractive designs. You have successfully completed your graphic or design studies in the field of digital media or are about to graduate and have preferably already gained professional experience in the e-commerce or agency field. Other requirements are: Independent, goal-oriented and reliable way of working Stylistic security and a good feeling for typographically correct representations Presentation ready, customer-oriented solutions on time and independently Very good knowledge of German in spoken and written Good knowledge of at least one foreign language is an advantage The following technical skills complete your profile: Experience with the Google Toolset for SEO / SEM Very good HTML5 knowledge Routine in using tools like SASS, LESS Experience in using the Adobe products Photoshop, InDesign and / or Illustrator A certain amount of stress resistance, team spirit and enthusiasm round off your profile. What we offer A young and dynamic team is waiting for you. Through innovative ideas you can successfully compete in a highly competitive environment. Fair and performance-related pay and opportunities for further education and participation in relevant conferences are a matter of course for us. Please submit your complete application with a curriculum vitae, photo and reference work as well as salary expectations and the possible starting date. Application form Informance IT As an IT service provider from Vienna, Informance also devotes itself to the development of custom software in the area of Java Enterprise, MS net, mobile apps, web services, Big Data and SOA, in addition to the distribution of ready-made solutions. Contact Phone: +43 (676) / 34 00 851 or +43 (676) / 34 00 852 Fax: +43 / 1 / 253 3033 7815 Contactform Address Otto-Probst-Straße 22 A-1100 Vienna Austria Concept & Design by - Informance Media - Powered by Informance ONE Portal Server
